info.title: Washcar Inventory  OpenAPI 30
info.description: This is a sample Washcar Inventory Server based on the OpenAPI.0 specification to manage cars into the washcar.

examples.text: Hey! Id like the deluxe wash package, please

requestBody.description: Update an existing car by Id

get.description: Returns a list of cars based on their status

parameters.name: carId
parameters.description: ID of the car that needs to be updated

post.description: Updates the details of a car

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: The API key of the app that is making the request.

post.description: Place a new order in the washcar
post.summary: Place an order for a car

get.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generate exceptions.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted

statusParam.name: status
statusParam.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

Car.description: Car object that needs to be added to the washcar
